about: A junior software engineer with hands-on experience in Java, TypeScript/JavaScript, Python, and Angular, having applied these skills in various roles, including automating testing processes for embedded devices and programmed firmware for 3D printers, developing a Gmail Addon using Google Apps Script and integrating the OpenAI API to automate invoice processing. Also contributed to cloud-based systems, building scalable access control systems on Google Cloud. Eager to continue expanding my skills and take on new challenges in fields such as automotive, embedded systems, or web development.

details: Developed a new hardware testing tool for embedded devices based on Robot Framework, enabling continuous and repeatable testing without human intervention.
Programmed firmware for 3D printers (Marlin and OctoPrint) and integrated TMC2209 stepper drivers for enhanced performance.
Designed and 3D-printed 8 functional prototypes, including fixtures and mounts, to support hardware development.
Applied CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment cycles and ensure consistent software updates.
Developed a Gmail Addon using Google Apps Script and OpenAI API to automatically process incoming invoices every 5 minutes, streamlining data entry.
Built a cloud-hosted access control system on Google Cloud Run with Firestore to support around 1,000 users, with the ability to scale to more users if required
Replaced legacy tools with a modernized system, halving development and configuration time.
Enhanced backend scalability, enabling seamless integration with multiple access control devices.
Delivered approximately 250 parcels daily with a 95% on-time delivery rate, ensuring high customer satisfaction.
Improved German language proficiency through daily interactions with a diverse customer base.

projects.title: CAN and OBD reader for BMW
projects.description: Developed a Python-based tool for real-time monitoring of OBD and CAN systems, supporting up to 6 parameters. Created a web app using Angular and NodeJS for live data visualization, improving diagnostic efficiency by automating insights.

projects.title: LogistiX: Factory Builder Unity Game
projects.description: Designed a 3D factory automation game in Unity with C#, featuring 11 crafting recipes and 3 processing machines. Modeled assets in Blender to maintain cohesive game aesthetics.

projects.title: Dynamic CV Generator
projects.description: Created a tool for efficiently customizing resumes to job descriptions, streamlining CV tailoring for users. This CV PDF was generated using the tool, and you can find a live demo on my GitHub page.
